column5: Heading to Rice Lake in a couple of weeks. Will be staying near the Otonobee river. I am looking for info on walleye, best baits, water temps, if it matters, and particular depths. We will be there the third week in June.
Fished in Rice Lake a couple of years ago in July.Cotton Cordell, Big O, 2", Pearl/Red eye retrieved slowly did the trick for walleye. Fished mostly near Sugar Island.Have a great time!
